name: Gucci Horsebit 1955 wallet with chain
description: The chain wallet in black leather is introduced as part of the Gucci Horsebit 1955 accessories collection, defined by the double ring and bar design also found in Handbags. The folded snap-closure shape features several card slots and pockets, completed with a detachable chain strap.

name: Women's Disney x Gucci Tennis 1977 sneaker with Web
description: Mickey Mouse’s playful image defines this GG canvas women's sneaker, trimmed with light brown leather details that convey a vintage look and feel. In celebration of the Lunar New Year, Disney’s legendary character appears throughout Gucci’s ready-to-wear and accessories for the Cruise 2020 collection, displayed as colorful prints, embroidered patches or jacquard motifs.

name: GG Marmont mini bag
description: Designed in a rounded shape, the GG Marmont mini bag is crafted from white quilted matelassé leather, defined by the line's emblematic Double G hardware—an archival symbol from the '70s that has become a hallmark of the House. The strap detail gives it a multifunctional appeal, allowing it to be worn around the neck as a necklace.

name: Geometric dots print silk fan
description: Enriching looks from the Spring Summer 2020 runway, the fan is crafted from wood and silk, then printed with a geometric dots pattern. Handcrafted in Spain by one of the most renowned artisanal families in Valencia, specializing in this technique for more than 200 years, the traditional shape is merged with a contemporary attitude. It is presented in a leather holder with the Gucci Orgasmique print—a distinctive motto seen throughout the collection, evoking a wider sense of excitement and enthusiasm. The design is completed with a shiny gold-toned Double G charm and detachable fringe tassel.

name: G-Timeless watch, 38mm
description: A special collection of styles features cartoon-style apples playfully set against the House’s monogram. Part of the G-Timeless collection, this watch showcases the whimsical pattern within a yellow gold PVD case.

name: G-Timeless watch, 38mm
description: Part of the G-Timeless collection, this watch combines two House icons: the Web stripe and Gucci bee. The green and red stripe motif continues around the strap and along the dial, surrounded by a steel case.

name: G-Timeless watch, 38mm
description: The Gucci Garden continues to be a limitless source of inspiration for the House, rich with animals and creatures that appear throughout the collections. The Kingsnake—a distinctive code of the House—wraps around the leather strap of the watch and continues onto the leather dial.

name: Silver watch with Horsebit, 22 x 30mm
description: Presented for Spring Summer 2020, the Horsebit watch in sterling silver is enriched with green enameled details. Part of Gucci’s genetic code, the double ring and bar design has been established as one of the most distinctive elements among the House symbols borrowed from the equestrian world. Here, it flanks a rectangular green malachite synthetic stone dial—a contemporary interpretation of the archival code that gives the watch a jewelry-like appeal.

name: Floral print cotton short kaftan dress
description: Animated by a gold and brown paisley floral print, this short kaftan dress has a relaxed silhouette with a drawstring subtly emphasizing the waistline and aged gold-toned metal buttons adding a vintage feel. First introduced as part of Gucci’s 1996 collection, the kaftan continues to be an integral part of the House aesthetic while evolving in new materials and modern details.

name: Short wool silk dress with Square G
description: Pastels push the color focus throughout the Pre-Fall 2020 collection, in soft, vibrant hues. Crafted from pink cady wool silk crêpe, this short dress is part of Gucci's new idea of femininity, characterized by a contemporary blend of sophisticated and daring. The squared scoop neck reveals a cut-out drop, closed by a crystal Square G detail, a reprisal of a '70s archival Gucci code.

name: Short crochet cotton dress
description: Crocheted designs bring softened texture and contrasting colors to the Pre-Fall 2020 collection. This short dress has a dropped neckline with self-tie and recalls styles from the late '60s and early '70s, and the blue and ivory crochet panels are sewn together by hand for an intarsia effect.

name: Long wool silk V-neck dress
description: Crafted from black wool silk crêpe, this long V-neck dress is part of Gucci's new idea of femininity, characterized by a contemporary blend of sophisticated and daring. A belt effect intarsia emphasizes the waist and is further embellished by crystal-studded ornamental buttons.

name: Women's Gucci Tennis 1977 high top sneaker
description: The Gucci Tennis 1977 sneaker is presented in a high-top version for the Pre-Fall 2020 collection. The sneaker is crafted from a jacquard fabric with the House's monogram that combines with the textured GG motif at the sole and the green and red Web. The style is finished with a dedicated label with the name of the line and a subtle embroidered detail of the number 77.

name: Women's Gucci Hawaii print Rhyton sneaker
description: Now a mainstay in the House's collections, the Rhyton sneaker is defined by its retro appeal and oversize construction. For Pre-Fall 2020, the style is enhanced with a colorful seasonal print featuring a vivid red poppy and the words Gucci Hawaii.

name: Women's Disney x Gucci Tennis 1977 sneaker with Web
description: Mickey Mouse’s playful image defines this GG canvas women's sneaker, trimmed with light brown leather details that convey a vintage look and feel. In celebration of the Lunar New Year, Disney’s legendary character appears throughout Gucci’s ready-to-wear and accessories for the Cruise 2020 collection, displayed as colorful prints, embroidered patches or jacquard motifs.

name: Gucci Off The Grid pouch
description: The zippered is introduced within a line of accessories and ready-to-wear presented for Pre-Fall 2020 made from recycled materials and trims, supporting the House's commitment to sustainability. Gucci Off The Grid is the first collection from Gucci Circular Lines—a concept created to support the House's vision for circular production. Designed for those mindful of their environmental impact, Gucci Off The Grid uses recycled, organic, bio-based and sustainably sourced materials. Regenerated nylon, crafted using recycled sewing thread and trims displays the GG pattern against an opaque background in black.

name: Rainbow Iris
description: The zipped pouch is presented in GG Supreme canvas trimmed with the green and red Web stripe and Double G hardware—a classic combination of the House's most recognizable elements that defines the line. The world of Ophidia continues to evolve, incorporating new shapes and silhouettes for Cruise 2020.

name: Online Exclusive square sunglasses with charms
description: A Gucci.com exclusive, the square framed sunglasses in yellow and brown acetate are completed with decorative charm details that add a whimsical touch to the look. The gold-toned metal temples have a braided effect, ending in a detachable chain with an Interlocking G acetate detail. The charms can be removed, repositioned and replaced as the wearer wishes.

name: Gucci Bestiary pouch with Kingsnake
description: A pouch crafted from black and grey GG Supreme canvas. Completed by a tonal leather trim, the accessory features the Kingsnake—a symbol thought to represent wisdom and power.

name: Animalier leather zip around wallet
description: Part of the Animalier collection, the leather zip around wallet features the distinctive metal bee detail. The bee is an archival code first introduced in Gucci ready-to-wear in the 1970s.

name: Belt with framed Double G buckle
description: A black leather belt defined by the Double G buckle. Inspired by an archival piece, the emblematic hardware is enhanced by a framed design.

name: Double G and Horsebit jacquard silk tie
description: The light blue tie is enriched with a jacquard pattern highlighting the Double G and Horsebit, adding visual texture to the silk. Symbols tied to the House's equestrian roots continue to enrich accessories in subtle ways. The Web stripe detail completes the necktie in the distinctive green and red combination paired with the Interlocking G Horsebit.

name: Tapered jeans with symbols
description: Inspired by nature, Gucci's collections are imbued with animal and symbolic motifs. Denim undergoes a treatment that involves stonewashing, dyeing and distressing to achieve a soft construction and create the distinctive faded effect. Includes a tag with the vintage postcard - the phrase in Italian from Latin first-century BC poem  - by Roman poet and philosopher Lucretius, which explains Epicurean philosophy.

name: Tapered embroidered jeans
description: A colorful mix of symbols that have become synonymous with the Gucci narrative are embroidered onto these black jeans, treated for a marbled effect that adds a vintage feel to the tapered leg. The feline, the bee, and the GG logo are combined with the lyre, a reference to the string instrument used in ancient Greece, introduced in past collections.

name: Marble washed denim flare pant
description: Specially stonewashed for a marbled, vintage look, this denim pant features the label. Translating literally to the motto plays on the concept that Gucci can be worn at any time. The latest collections make a strong statement in denim, reworking the cult fabric with different shapes and treatments. Pieces with versatile ways to wear and style embrace each person who is part of the House’s individual spirit.

name: Peony print silk bowling shirt
description: A pink-hued peony print adds a romantic feel to this bowling shirt, crafted from black GG jacquard silk and treated for a wrinkled finish. For the Pre-Fall 2020 collection, coordinating ensembles reminiscent of bowling attire are reimagined with a refined take on materials and color schemes that elevate classic streetwear styles.

name: Hawaiian print bowling shirt
description: A new interpretation of the classic Hawaiian print, with a lavish scene of palm leaves and vivid red anthurium flowers, unfolds onto a dark-hued jacquard silk background. For the Pre-Fall 2020 collection, coordinating ensembles reminiscent of bowling attire are reimagined with a refined take on materials and color schemes that elevate classic streetwear styles like the bowling shirt.

name: Hawaiian print bowling shirt
description: The classic bowling shirt is reimagined with a shrunken fit, presented in a look with washed denim pants. A new interpretation of the classic Hawaiian print, with a lavish scene of palm leaves and vivid red anthurium flowers, unfolds onto an ivory-hued background. For the Pre-Fall 2020 collection, designs reminiscent of bowling attire are reimagined with a refined take on materials and color schemes that elevate classic streetwear styles.

name: Cotton polo with Interlocking G stripe
description: A distinctive detail of the latest collections, the Interlocking G stripe runs down the sleeves of this dark blue stretch cotton piquet polo, with off-white contrast collar. Reminiscent of logo tapes typically found on vintage tracksuits, the side band serves as a sporty play on the historical Gucci logo.

name: Suede and knit cotton bomber jacket
description: The House continues to play with the idea of mixed-materials in this bomber jacket, presented in a combination of brown knit cotton and suede. The green and red Web enhances the front and is paired with enameled Interlocking G Horsebit details—symbols inspired by the equestrian world. Back to streamlined silhouettes that play with color and cult fabrics, Gucci rejuvenates its most emblematic codes from the archives in a refreshing mix of classic and contemporary that speaks to a new aesthetic.

name: Nylon cape with Gucci print
description: Crafted from water-resistant nylon, the hooded cape is designed with snaps, buttons and cords that allow for an adjustable fit. Enriched with the House logo print, the stowable accessory can be folded into a coordinating pouch.

name: Reversible bomber jacket with Gucci Orgasmique
description: A distinctive motto of the Spring Summer 2020 collection,  label, which translates literally to and plays on the concept that Gucci can be worn at any time.

name: Leather jacket with Web
description: Originally inspired by the equestrian world, the Web takes on new forms this season. Here the stripe motif adds contrast to a leather jacket.

name: GG jacquard nylon padded coat
description: A distinctive detail of the Cruise 2020 collection, the Interlocking G stripe runs down the sleeves of this goose down padded coat, crafted from GG jacquard nylon. Reminiscent of logo tapes typically found on vintage tracksuits, the side band serves as a sporty play on the historical Gucci logo.

name: Wool tweed midi skirt with slit
description: High-waisted skirts with daring slits are part of the femininity that defines the new aesthetic of Gucci, one that mixes ladylike vibes with what the Creative Director described as a beautiful cliché of sexiness. Crafted from bubblegum pink soft wool tweed, a distinctive bon ton fabric, this skirt is presented in a pastel ensemble with its coordinating tonal jacket inspired by the 60s.

name: Silk organdy skirt with slit
description: Imbued with a romantic feel, the sheer skirt gives a subtle contrast to the daring looks of the Spring Summer 2020 collection. A mix of vivid colors and transparencies, and sleek and delicate silhouettes, redefines the concept of femininity with hints to the idea of freedom that fashion experienced in the ‘90s. Crafted from pleated wisteria silk organdy, the flowing design reveals a side slit—a recurring element of this collection.

name: Sequin embroidered skirt with slit
description: High-waisted skirts with side slits walked the Spring Summer 2020 runway, embodying what the Creative Director described as a beautiful cliché of sexiness, inspired by the idea of freedom that fashion experienced in the ‘90s. With allover black sequin embroidery, this skirt adds a glimmering note to a streamlined ensemble.

name: Tweed skirt
description: A historical Gucci code borrowed from the equestrian world, the green and red Web is reworked into ribbon trimming this ivory and black tweed skirt. Imbued with an inherent ladylike feel, tweed defines the House's collections, from traditional shapes to unexpected, contemporary designs.

name: Platform sandal with Double G
description: The most recognizable Gucci lines are once again updated in a more modern interpretation, these high heel sandals are now presented with a metallic laminate leather covered platform in platinum laminate leather. An emblem of the GG Marmont line, the Double G is an archival play on the original Running G, a belt buckle that first appeared in Gucci collections in the '70s.

name: Platform sandal with Double G
description: The most recognizable Gucci lines are once again updated in a more modern interpretation, these high heel sandals are now presented with a leather covered platform in black leather. An emblem of the GG Marmont line, the Double G is an archival play on the original Running G, a belt buckle that first appeared in Gucci collections in the '70s.

name: Women's slide with Double G
description: A slide sandal crafted from shimmering platinum colored leather. An emblem of the GG Marmont line, the Double G serves as a contemporary play on the Running G belt buckle from Gucci's 1970s archives.

name: Leather sandal
description: The Double G gold-toned hardware is set on the strap of these high-heel leather sandals

name: Women's platform sandal with Double G
description: With a defined block heel, the platform sandal is introduced with the House's monogram hardware in silver-toned metal. The Double G signature emblem, from the GG Marmont line, continues to bring a defining element to styles. Presented in a delicate hue of blue leather, pastel shades combine as a defining feature of the Pre-Fall 2020 collection.

name: Mid-heel platform slide sandal
description: The black leather slide sandal is set on a platform with chunky heel with a wide strap decorated with the Horsebit. Part of Gucci’s genetic code, the double ring and bar design has been established as one of the most distinctive elements among the House symbols borrowed from the equestrian world.

name: Women's leather sandal with Horsebit chain
description: A classic silhouette, the heeled sandal is presented for Spring Summer 2020 in shiny leather with shining crystal details at the ankle closure. In a reinterpretation of one of the House's most emblematic archival symbols, the gold-toned Horsebit chain combines with an enameled bar atop the front strap.

name: Metallic leather platform sandal
description: Gathered thin straps come together to form a front knot detail that balances the chunky platform and heel of this metallic leather sandal. Crystal trims line the shape, while the lining is contrasting by a metallic gold Gucci print.

name: Women's mid-heel slide
description: The Double G mid-heel slide sandal is presented for the Pre-Fall 2020 collection in a shimmering metallic leather. The shoe is completed with a defined block heel and a playful fringe trim.

name: Women's mid-heel slide with chain
description: Defined by its square-shaped toe, the mid-heel slide sandal is accentuated by the distinctive gold-toned metal chain taken from the Sylvie handbags collection. Crafted from silver metallic leather, the shoe is completed with a logo print lining.

name: Women's heeled sandal
description: Silver colored leather with a metallic shimmer adds a contemporary twist to a classic silhouette. Defined by criss-cross straps and a logo print lining, the sandal is elevated with a thin, stiletto style heel.

name: Women's GG matelassé canvas slide sandal
description: A signature Gucci shoe reimagined with a strong logo connotation for Spring Summer 2020. Defined by the archival Double G hardware from the '70s, the slide sandal is presented in diagonal matelassé Original GG canvas—a timeless pairing that pays homage to the House's heritage.
